titles.title: Political Convention Reform Act of 2007
Political Convention Reform Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prohibit the use of public funds for political party conventions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Political Convention Reform Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions providing for the use of funds from the Presidential Election Campaign Fund for presidential nominating conventions.
